description:
http://nova.openstack.org/adminguide/nova.manage.html#nova-floating-ips

It should clarify that the host arg is specifically a service node , which is running nova-network.
title: Documentation for floating ip should clarify that <host> arg is specifically a host that runs nova-network instance.
